website_summaries.verdict: An indoor broom that won't disappoint. You only have to decide if you really want a 6-pack.
pros: Flagged bristles sweep up fine dust
Comes in fine, medium, and heavy-duty bristles to meet your needs
Enough brooms for the garage, basement, shop, and patio
Large metal handle is easy to hold
cons: You need enough storage space for 6 brooms

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with these brooms are the gap in the center of the broom. I know many brooms have this but is is large on this one and at times leaves a line of dirt if you don’t put enough pressure on the bristles. For the money though it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought three sets so far for warehouse use, handles are a little cheap, but the broom head is really sturdy and should last a while. Would buy again, I’m happy with the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: This broom does what a broom does.
customer_reviews.text: Fine bristle great for fine dust. two hole design allows for even wear on the broom.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W. Jenkins III

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and inexpensive brooms
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product costing way lost than buying at store. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: USAF Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: All handles broken, have had to replace all with wooden handles
customer_reviews.author: John Hardiman

customer_reviews.title: Decent broom for outdoor.
customer_reviews.text: Price is right but the broom stick could be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: MoyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These brooms work great on both smooth and slightly rough concrete. great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 pack
customer_reviews.text: Great value buying in a pack like that rather than one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good shop broom
customer_reviews.text: Use for my shop, they seem to be holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Used it for sweeping a warehouse floor. Got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job Plus
customer_reviews.text: A broom works like a broom unless it is made with too much plastic. The one thing that they also can be used for is when it snows. My mother-in-law has great difficulty walking in the snow and as someone in her late 80's, she very well should. She has found that use a push broom like these helps to keep her secure feeling and upright. When her broom broke a while back, I was happy that I had an extra one that I could share with her and she is very happy with it. Thank you for the opportunity to try these out and also to keep the MIL safe.
customer_reviews.author: Moonwishes (AKA Gail Rodgers)

customer_reviews.title: Great broom but you will need to buy support braces seperately
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This is a great deal of six brooms which can be used on pretty much any surface, the bristles are frayed synthetic and can be used on hard wood and prefab floors without scratching the finish. The broom handles are metal and can screw into both sides of the brush to adjust for wear and the brush backs are made of basically recycled milk jugs, the same stuff as the artifical deck wood you can pick up at Lowes or Home Depot. The Cons: You will need to buy metal braces to support the handle and brush to avoid the brush cracking and breaking from serious/heavy duty use. But over all a great deal for six sturdy brooms.
customer_reviews.author: D. Matlack

customer_reviews.title: I use these all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth would you need 6 push brooms? I have kids and a a lot of patio area, so they can keep it swept up and looking sharp. If each family member has their own; you can clear the decks, patio, and front walk in 1⁄4 of the time. It's worth it! They are very sturdy and well-weighted to make cleaning up simple and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Stryker

customer_reviews.title: don't hold up
customer_reviews.text: These simply don't hold up for anything beyond very light use. They have a design flaw in that the part on the handle that screws into the broomhead is just weak plastic, so it breaks off if you are brushing anything with more resistance than minor dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large sturdy inside broom
customer_reviews.text: First things first - this product comes in a six pack, so make sure you order the right quantity. Second, it is a large broom, good for sweeping open areas of flooring. Not quite so good for sweeping flooring in a typical sized living or dining area in a home. Third, it is substantial. It seems like this product could endure daily use for some time without breaking or losing bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Will Barto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple garage broom
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I use this type of broom weekly in my garage. I usually buy one or two a year so buying a six pack is great. The brushes are perfect. They are not too soft or too rigid. Overall it does feel cheap but it does the job that I need it for. There really is no reason to have a fancy expensive broom as long as it cleans the floors. I would highly recommend getting a six pack of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Set of 6 brooms
customer_reviews.text: Push brooms are the best. Having a pack of 6 makes it easy to keep them strategically located in areas of demand. These are sturdy and easy to use. The box is gigantic and has a box within a box. The most difficult process of putting the broom together was getting to the pieces. These perform well and are a welcome addition to my household. My basement is especially relieved to have these.
customer_reviews.author: Invalid Response

customer_reviews.title: A decent, all-around push. Bristles are on the softer side
customer_reviews.text: A good, general use, push broom. The bristles are moderately soft - I generally prefer a more stiff bristle, but these aren't bad. Works just as well on my tile and outside on concrete. I don't have hardwood floors, so I can't say if this would scuff them up, but the ends of the bristles are fluffed, so I wouldn't think so, but better to be safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Storm the Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy brooms
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, sturdy brooms. They are fairly easy to store. It is a little difficult to find uses for all six of the brooms, but we have extras. I like the fact that there are holes for the broom pole on each side to reduce wear and tear on the broom. The brooms hold up well even with our heavy duty sweeping. These are some really nice brooms.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a bargain for 6 brooms
customer_reviews.text: This is no doubt quite a bargain price for 6 push brooms. The brooms are quite substantial and good quality. Although they are not as heavy duty as others I've had, they suit our medium sweeping task needs perfectly and are easy to maneuver. The brushes grab debris well. The question would be do you need 6 push brooms?
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa (M.W.)

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty push brooms!
customer_reviews.text: This 6 pack of 18 inch push-brooms would be great for large residences or small businesses. I appreciate that the pole can be screwed into two options (either side) of the broom base. These brooms are strong and good for residential areas such as basements, driveways, back patios, front porches, and garages. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: LiliBelle

customer_reviews.title: Lots o' Brooms!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! That's a lot of brooms! These are very high quality. The sweep is easy and the long brush strands have the perfect amount of flex. Enough to move the dirt pretty far but not shoot it across the room! The pole is sturdy. All in all very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: John Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy push brooms
customer_reviews.text: This is a 6 pack of brooms. They come with the handles and broom heads separate and they just need to be screwed in. They work well, I am using one each in my garage, basement, porch and kennel. Good sturdy handles and the bristles are strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Function
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Didn't realize I was getting 6 of them, but hey. Easy to assemble, good quality, and function as expected. Didn't realize how nice it is to have brooms strategically placed throughout the property.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics 18-inch Push Broom Kit, Fine Floor - 6-Pack
customer_reviews.text: Great brooms for the price. I like that you can switch the handle from one side to the other for even wear and tear. 6 is a bit of overkill for apartment dwellers , but should allow homeowners the ability to spread them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: new yorker

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, well made broom
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well made broom. Does a great job in the basement and garage. These are great to keep around for random dirty clean up!
customer_reviews.author: H.F.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this broom to sweep up the dog hair on my tile floor and it worked great. I also tried the broom on the front porch, and it worked great on the concrete. Overall a nice broom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy, great handle, strong brush—these are going to last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: its easily 3 times
customer_reviews.text: i can't believe people are buying this, its easily 3 times overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Aj t
